content: Our session on cancellation didn't yield a finished story, but we did certainly learn a lot. Here's some cleaned up notes on the GitHub issue. We can use this Zulip thread to coordinate turning those notes into actual stories.
@rylev Hi, did you get a chance to do more research on cancellations to progress with the story creation?
I certainly didn't get around to doing that. :(
A little bit more, yes. If anything we'll start with the story about accidental cancellation
The stop_token crate mentions the use case of a chat server where the server wants to cancel the chat future only when a full message has been sent. We could use that as an example.
